title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public express(February 2007)
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
abstract: Eleven stories from the general public, created as part of a Digital Storytelling workshop.
description: These eleven short stories were created as part of a Digital Storytelling workshop in February 2007. They mostly run for less than two minutes and cover diverse subject matter, including treasured family members, life changing events and vocational experiences.
